ei.agent.enterpriseagent.enactment
Class BetrayalModelSupplier

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Agent
      ei.EIAgent
          ei.agent.enterpriseagent.EnterpriseAgent
              ei.agent.enterpriseagent.enactment.EnactmentEnterpriseAgent
                  ei.agent.enterpriseagent.enactment.AutomaticEnterpriseAgent
                      ei.agent.enterpriseagent.enactment.BetrayalModelSupplier
All Implemented Interfaces:
jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class BetrayalModelSupplier
extends AutomaticEnterpriseAgent

This supplier agent responds to contract events according to the Betrayal Model, described in paper: Joana Urbano, Henrique Lopes Cardoso, Ana Paula Rocha, Eugénio Oliveira, “Trust and Normative Control in Multi-Agent Systems”, Advances in Distributed Computing and Artificial Intelligence Journal, Vol. I, No. 1, July 2012, pp. 43-52 (2012)

Author:
Patricia Alves Nov 2012 - Jan 2013
See Also:
Serialized Form

METHODS

Overrides:
setup in class AutomaticEnterpriseAgent

calcBetrayPropensity

public void calcBetrayPropensity()
OK! Calculates the supplier's betray propensity. (if integrity is low: 0.5, if integrity is medium: 0.3, if integrity is high: 0.1). Corresponds to ro in paper.

assessCurrentSituation

public boolean assessCurrentSituation(CompetenceCall compCall,
                                      Competence competence,
                                      java.lang.String contractID)
The supplier assesses the current situation everytime he identifies a new opportunity (when he receives a new proposal), and therefore will consider betraying one of his active contracts, according to his betrayPropensity. This implies assessing the benefits of betraying (betrayalBenefit()) and the relationship (relationshipValue()). Returns true id the contract is deemed to betray, false otherwise.

valueBetrayal

public BetrayalModelSupplier.ValueBetrayal valueBetrayal(java.lang.String contractID,
                                                         CompetenceCall compCall,
                                                         Competence competence)
Calculates the (benefit) value of betraying the active contract, according to the new proposal received in the cfp.

Returns:
BetrayalBenefit.Low if low, BetrayalBenefit.Medium if medium, BetrayalBenefit.High if high. By default returns BetrayalBenefit.Low.

numPastContracts

public int numPastContracts(java.lang.String agentName)
OK! Returns the number of past contracts with the potencial victim in the last units of time.

Parameters:
agentName - - name of the proponing client agent.
Returns:
Number of past contracts in the last units of time.

continuityPerspective

public boolean continuityPerspective(java.lang.String agentName)
OK! Calculates the continuity perspective with the potencial victim based on the number of past contracts. If the numPastContracts is equal or greater than the minNumPastContracts returns true (high perspective). Otherwise returns false (not high).

Returns:

hasMinActiveContracts

public boolean hasMinActiveContracts()
Checks if the supplier has at least minNumActiveContracts active contracts.

Returns:
True if has at least minNumActiveContracts active contracts. False otherwise.

valueRelationship

public BetrayalModelSupplier.ValueRelationship valueRelationship(java.lang.String contractID)
Calculates the relationship value of the active contract with the potential, victim according to equations 5 and 6, and table 1.

Returns:
RelationshipValue.low if the relationship value is low, RelationshipValue.medium if medium, RelationshipValue.high if high. By default returns RelationshipValue.high;

decideOnEnteringNegotiation

public boolean decideOnEnteringNegotiation(CompetenceCall compCall,
                                           Competence competence)
Decides if the supplier agent enters the negotiation based on the received proposal: business oportunity. The agent will probabilistically consider betraying one of his active contracts: betray propensity (ro). With a probability This decision is based on the assessment made by calling the functions assessCurrentSituation.

Overrides:
decideOnEnteringNegotiation in class EnterpriseAgent
Returns:

handleObligationReport

protected boolean handleObligationReport(Obligation obl)
Description copied from class: AutomaticEnterpriseAgent
Handles an obligation report. In this implementation, if this agent is the obligation's bearer, it will consider fulfilling according to the following optional arguments:
  • obligation_fulfillment_probability: a value in [0,1], default is 1.0
  • obligation_delayed_fulfillment_probability: a value in [0,1], default is 0.0
  • obligation_fulfillment_min_time: a value in [0,1+], default is 0.0
  • obligation_fulfillment_max_time: a value in [0,1+], default is 1.0

Overrides:
handleObligationReport in class AutomaticEnterpriseAgent
Parameters:
obl - The obligation report
Returns:
true if this agent is the obligation's bearer and chooses to fulfill the obligation; false otherwise
